title: The GFDL-CM4X climate model hierarchy, Part I: Model description and thermal properties
journal: Journal of Advances in Modeling Earth Systems
contributionStatement: Member of core model development team. Adjusted ice albedos in the model to main reasonable strength of the Antarctic Circumpolar Current. Led the evaluation of the benchmark metrics compared to previous generation models. (C=5\% / D=10\% / A=10\% / I=10\% / W=5\%)
